name: Canoon
description:
A quick-draw and volley kind of game. Can be played with two players or to get a high score by yourself, depending on preference.

Pressing the A key causes the red pirate to fire(if he's holding the ball), or causes them to stop the blue pirate's shot if its in the air.

Pressing the L key does the same thing, except it does it for the blue pirate and stops the red pirate's shot.
